attributes.action: Let the Worsley mesnes bonfire carry on going.
attributes.background: Worsley mesnes bonfire has been on going for many of years. Absolutely thoughtful people bringing the community together all for free and amazing entertainment for FREE . The children enjoy this aswell as the adults and I've never known the community come together so much . Amazing people

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the bonfire organisers or the local authority, and not the UK Government or Parliament.
